title: Diamond 5 ADC MAIN looking for a rank team!
body:
Hi guys Diamond 5 ADC main looking for a semi serious team
I main Caitlyn, Sivir, Quinn, Graves and lucian,
Ive been playing the game for a bout 4 years now and have been climbing since then!
I currently sit diamond 5 and now looking to play in a team!
very Friendly and out going guy, I am 21 years of age and enjoy playing
if you want to add me my main is Wyndhem or my smurf, Argnean,

please feel free to hit me add with an add or ask any question!

replies.body: Hi, Fantasy esports is Recruiting. i added you in game so we can talk about if you want to join the team. the goal for this team is to reach the challenger series
are you still looking for people?
